scripts.local_selenium: npx selenium-standalone install && npx selenium-standalone start
scripts.env: npx concurrently "npm run server" "npm run dev_tunnel" "npm run local_selenium"
scripts.run_update_refs: npx concurrently --success=first --kill-others "npm run env" "sleep 5; npm run update_refs"
scripts.run_test: npx concurrently --success=first --kill-others "npm run env" "sleep 5; npm run test"
scripts.grid_env: npx concurrently "npm run server" "npm run dev_tunnel"
scripts.grid_run_update_refs: GRID_URL="http://geo:9a847400b43b75f6852363207b09aa0d@sg.yandex-team.ru:4444/wd/hub" npx concurrently --success=first --kill-others "npm run grid_env" "sleep 5; npm run grid_update_refs"
scripts.grid_run_test: GRID_URL="http://geo:9a847400b43b75f6852363207b09aa0d@sg.yandex-team.ru:4444/wd/hub" npx concurrently --success=first --kill-others "npm run grid_env" "sleep 5; npm run grid_test"
